#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;
int main(void) 
{
	int t;
	scanf ("%d", &t);
	for (t; t > 0; --t)
	{
		int len, i, swin = 0, cwin = 0, sp = 0, cp = 0;
		scanf ("%d", &len);
		char str[len+1];
		scanf ("%s", str);
		for (i = 0; i < len; ++i)
		{
			if (str[i] == 'S')
			{
				if (sp == 40)
				{
					sp = 0;
					cp = 0;
					++swin;
					//printf ("%d\n", sp);	
				}	
				else if (sp < 30)
				{
					sp = sp + 15;
					//printf ("%d\n", sp);
				}	
				else
				{
					sp = sp + 10;
					//printf ("%d\n", sp);
				}		
			}
			if (str[i] == 'C')
			{
				if (cp == 40)
				{
					cp = 0;
					sp = 0;
					++cwin;	
				}	
				else if (cp < 30)
					cp = cp + 15;
				else
					cp = cp + 10;
			}
		}
		if ((sp != 0) || (cp != 0))
			printf ("%d-%d,%d-%d\n", swin, cwin, sp, cp);
		else
			printf ("%d-%d\n", swin, cwin);
	}
	return 0;
}
